00024 void TargetNameEdit::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent * e ) {
00025         
00026         // event is handled only if the left mouse button was pressed
00027         if (e->button() != Qt::LeftButton) {
00028                 e->ignore();
00029                 return;
00030         }
00031 
00032         // accept the event so it wont be passed to parent
00033         e->accept();
00034 
00035         QString file = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this, 
00036                 tr("Set a target file"), baseLocation_.absolutePath());
00037 
00038         // if no file was selected
00039         if (file.isEmpty()) {
00040                 return;
00041         }
00042 
00043         // create QDir instance to match the base location
00044         QDir baseDir(baseLocation_.absoluteDir());
00045 
00046         // create the relative path
00047         QString relPath = QDir::cleanPath(baseDir.relativeFilePath(file));
00048 
00049         // set the relative path to the lineEdit
00050         setText(relPath);
00051 }
